title: EXPLOITATION - Deactivate Kondor+ realtime inbound and outbound connectivity with ATLAS

task_list.instruction_title:
TASK CANCEL IN CASE OF PRE-15033 PLAYED DURING PREMIG ACTIVITIES (RUN and DR)

Deactivate realtime inbound and outbound connectivity with Atlas on Prod Like Environment:
 - Incoming: ConvFromHost (On-Line), Treasury Link (On-Line), Treasury Link Deposit
 - Outgoing: HostLink FX (On-Line), HostLink MM (On Line), LinkVision Export, Cours Spot Minute

Disable these jobs:

For me you have to run this job insted of the previous one : Ex_T001APP_KDR_KILL-LOOP-START-CONVLINK

For me you have to run this job insted of the previous one : 

Ex_T001KDR_NDO871

Ex_T001KDR_NDO881




Note : Jobs will be reactivated in IP Task [TRT-11500](TRT-11500_116109842.html)
